node.title: VidViz
node.content:
Source code

Developed specifically for a VFX artist to facilitate his workflow, but generalist enough to be used in various cases where one wants to visualize and control multiple videos at the same time, or simply better manage a video library. As of now, it is primarily designed to be used as a local tool.

features :

Videos :
  • Control multiple videos at once : play/pause, video speed, auto-loop, show/hide controls.

  • Select/unselect.

    • Hide/view videos
    • Download videos associated json files.
    • Delete videos and json files.
  • Contextual menu to open file in system browser or download json.
Files :
  • Upload files or use them directly using the file system. The app will update its content.
  • Upload json files associated with each video to get the metadata of that video you selected.
  • Automatic encoding of video thumbnails for better viewing experience.
  • Search, filter, edit and delete your collections.

possible evolutions

  • Online version with security
  • SAAS service ...

node.title: MultiChat
node.description: Experimental P2P discussion app using graphs.
node.content:
Source code

Experiment to see how graphs could help make discussions less linear than in traditional forums, chats, etc...

It uses webRTC to make communications P2P, it just needs a simple node server that serves as a listener. PouchDB is used as local storage, meaning conversations are stored on clients instead of on the server.

node.title: NCsimJS
node.description: Non interactive simulation of an eco-system.
node.content:
Source code | Demo

Simulation of an eco-system where multiple agents must cooperate in order to survive. To try it out, check the demo above, and click a few times on "speed +".

features :

  • map generation with random tiles
  • agents can eat, starve to death, gather food, and build some constructions and tools
  • basic time manager (slower, faster, pause)
  • agents have a memory of visited tiles and a "social circle"

possible evolutions

  • various hazards
  • more buildings
  • switch all the logic server-side and make it interactive : play as a minion with AIs and /or other players
  • more parameters to play with

node.title: Easy billing
node.description: Simple desktop billing app for freelancers.
node.content:
Source code

Simply keep track of your bills and clients, print them in pdf.

The bill layout is made for one specific context, but can be customized using html and css.

This app is not maintained anymore and may contain security issues that can be resolved by updating dependencies. Also, it shouldn't be used as the main way to store history of professional bills without securing how data is saved.
